scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.server:build: cd ./server && npm install && npm run server:build
scripts.server:start: cd ./server && NODE_ENV=development NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./src/config npm run server:start
scripts.client:build: cd ./client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start:dev: npm run server:start & npm run client:start
